wikipedia_page.main: Matthew John Fitzsimmons (born 10 December 1913, date of death unknown) was an English footballer who played as a centre half for Liverpool, Mather United and Ipswich Town. He also featured for York City as a wartime guest. He was born in Toxteth, Liverpool.

response: * Matthew Fitzsimmons (born 1913), English football centre half who played for Liverpool
